welcome: Welcome to the Room Occupancy Tracker!
enterCredentials: Enter your credentials to access the dashboard
notFoundHint: Did you forget to add the page to the router?
activePersonnelDesc: List of employees currently checked into the secure room.
accessHistoryDesc: Complete log of all entry and exit events.
uploadedUsersDesc: Table of users from uploaded Excel file. Search by Iqama, Name, Passport, or Nationality. Click QR to view and download.
name: Name
confirmDeleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete all uploaded users? This action cannot be undone.
missingIqamaColumn: Excel file must contain 'Iqama' column. Please check your file and try again.
missingNameColumn: Excel file must contain 'Name' column. Please check your file and try again.
duplicateIqama: The following Iqama numbers appear more than once: {duplicates}. Please remove duplicates and try again.
noDataFound: No valid user data found in the Excel file. Please check your file format and try again.
fileReadError: Unable to read the file. Please make sure it's a valid Excel file and try again.
deleteError: Error deleting data. Please try again.
searchUploadedUsers: Search by Iqama, Name, Passport, or Nationality...
searchHint: You can search by Iqama, Name, Passport, or Nationality
